entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `name` TEXT NOT NULL, `order_chronometer_ids` TEXT NOT NULL, `is_archived` INTEGER NOT NULL)

indices.name: index_sections_id
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_sections_id` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id`)

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `title` TEXT NOT NULL, `created_at` TEXT NOT NULL, `start_date` TEXT NOT NULL, `last_time_running` TEXT NOT NULL, `format` INTEGER NOT NULL, `section_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `is_active` INTEGER NOT NULL, `is_archived` INTEGER NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY(`section_id`) REFERENCES `sections`(`id`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE CASCADE )

indices.name: index_chronometers_section_id
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_chronometers_section_id` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`section_id`)

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `chronometer_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `time` TEXT NOT NULL, `type` INTEGER NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY(`chronometer_id`) REFERENCES `chronometers`(`id`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE CASCADE )

indices.name: index_events_id
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_events_id` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id`)

indices.name: index_events_chronometer_id
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_events_chronometer_id` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`chronometer_id`)

views.createSql: CREATE VIEW `${VIEW_NAME}` AS SELECT chronometer_id, MAX(id) AS last_event_id FROM events GROUP BY chronometer_id

CREATE VIEW `${VIEW_NAME}` AS SELECT c.id as c_id,c.title as c_title, c.created_at as c_created_at, c.start_date as c_start_date, c.last_time_running as c_last_time_running, c.format as c_format, c.section_id as c_section_id, c.is_active as c_is_active, c.is_archived as c_is_archived, e.id as last_event_id, e.time as last_event_time, e.type as last_event_type FROM chronometers AS c LEFT JOIN last_event_ref AS lef ON c.id = lef.chronometer_id LEFT JOIN events AS e ON e.id = lef.last_event_id
CREATE VIEW `${VIEW_NAME}` AS SELECT * FROM sections AS s LEFT JOIN chronometer_with_last_event AS c ON s.id = c.c_section_id

setupQueries: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS room_master_table (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,identity_hash TEXT)
